corridor_1_south.description: The door to the outside world!
It is locked, of course. What did you expect?
The exit and the only barrier to the outside world is a locked door.

corridor_2_north.description: You are standing in the Newbury office.

corridor_5_east.description: There is a key on top of the cabinet but it is too high to reach.

aisle_2_east.description: The pedestal under this desk has been moved.

wall_clock.description: There is a clock hanging on the wall.

briefcase.description: Click above and below the dial numbers to change the combination.

stationery_cupboard.description: The cupboard appears to be screwed shut with a locking plate. Obviously counsel's notepads are in demand.

exit_door.description: The door is locked. It looks like you need a keycard to unlock it.
The door is still locked. For some reason the keycard did not work.
The door is unlocked! The outside world awaits you!

printer_log_in.description: Click next to the options to enter log in details.

Run print job.message: There is a familiar repetitive whirring and clunking sound and four pieces of paper now sit on the printer tray.

printer_hal.description: I'm afraid I cannot do that, Dave.

pedestal.description: It is too dark to see anything.

pedestal_light.description: You can see a key card between the pedestal and cabinet but it is just out of reach.

phone.description: Click on the keypad numbers to enter the passcode.
